Question: Korea Institute of Science and Technology CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SK Group

CES 2024 Showcase: SK Group unveiled a dazzling display of world-leading Artificial Intelligence (AI) and carbon reduction technologies under an amusement park concept called “SK Wonderland.” The exhibit showcased AI technologies such as a location analysis platform, pet diagnostic assistant, and an Urban Air Mobility vehicle with an AI processor from SAPEON, a subsidiary of SK Telecom. Other highlights included advanced memory solutions from SK hynix, glass substrate from Absolics, EV batteries from SK On, and hydrogen energy solutions from SK E&S. SK's top global leadership, including SK Chairman Tae-won Chey, attended CES to strengthen global partnerships in AI and clean tech. SK Group is a collection of global industry-leading companies driving innovations in energy, advanced materials, biopharmaceuticals, and digital business, with a shared commitment to reducing global greenhouse gas emissions.
Summary_cn:
SK集团

CES 2024展示：SK集团以“SK乐园”为概念，展示了世界领先的人工智能（AI）和碳减排技术的令人眼花缭乱的展示。展览展示了SK Telecom子公司SAPEON的人工智能处理器的城市空中流动交通工具、位置分析平台、宠物诊断助手等AI技术。其他亮点包括SK hynix的先进存储解决方案、Absolics的玻璃基板、SK On的电动汽车电池以及SK E&S的氢能解决方案。SK集团顶级全球领导团队，包括SK主席Tae-won Chey，出席CES以加强在人工智能和清洁技术领域的全球合作伙伴关系。SK集团是一家全球领先的公司集团，致力于在能源、先进材料、生物制药和数字业务领域推动创新，并共同致力于减少全球温室气体排放。
